history.proof: intros c a b H1 H2 H3. apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2 := a). - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: Rlt_trans, Rmult_lt_compat_r, Rmult_comm. - hfcrush use: Rmult_lt_compat_l, Rle_lt_trans, Rmult_1_r.

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "a <= b * c" with "a <= a".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rmult_comm (_ * _) does not match any subterm of the goal

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "?M2289 * ?M2288 < ?M2290 * ?M2288" with "a < a \\/ a = a".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "0 < b" with "a <= a".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "?M2288 < ?M2290" with "a < a \\/ a = a".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "c < 1" with "a <= a".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "?M2288 < ?M2290" with "a < a \\/ a = a".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "c < 1" with "a <= a".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "c < 1" with "a <= a".

original: intros c a b H1 H2 H3. apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2 := a). apply H3. rewrite Rmult_comm. apply Rmult_lt_compat_r. apply H1. apply Rlt_trans with (r2 := 1). apply H2. apply Rlt_trans with (r2 := c). apply H2. apply H2.
